org.apache.juneau.rest.logging

Interface RestLogger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDisabledRestLogger, BasicRestLogger, BasicTestCaptureRestLogger, BasicTestRestLogger, RestLogger.Void

    public interface RestLogger
    Interface class used for logging HTTP requests.

    The RestLogger.Builder.type(Class) method has been provided for easy extension of this class.

    The following default implementations are also provided:

    • BasicRestLogger - The default logger typically used.
    • BasicDisabledRestLogger - A no-op logger if you want to turn off logging entirely.
    • BasicTestRestLogger - A logger useful for testcases.
    • BasicTestCaptureRestLogger - Useful for capturing log messages for testing logging itself.
    • RestContext.Builder.callLogger()
    • RestContext.Builder.debugEnablement()
    • RestContext.Builder.debugOn(String)
    • Rest.debug()
    • RestOp.debug()
    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > Logging / Debugging

    • Field Detail

      • SP_logger

        static final String SP_logger
        System property name for the default logger name to use for RestLogger objects.

        Can also use a JUNEAU_RESTLOGGER_LOGGER environment variable.

        If not specified, the default is "global".

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SP_enabled

        static final String SP_enabled
        System property name for the default enablement setting for RestLogger objects.

        Can also use a JUNEAU_RESTLOGGER_ENABLED environment variable.

        The possible values are:

        • "ALWAYS" (default) - Logging is enabled.
        • "NEVER" - Logging is disabled.
        • "CONDITIONALLY" - Logging is enabled if it passes the RestLogger.Builder.enabledTest(Predicate) test.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SP_requestDetail

        static final String SP_requestDetail
        System property name for the default request detail setting for RestLogger objects.

        Can also use a JUNEAU_RESTLOGGER_REQUESTDETAIL environment variable.

        • "STATUS_LINE" (default) - Log only the status line.
        • "HEADER" - Log the status line and headers.
        • "ENTITY" - Log the status line and headers and content if available.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SP_responseDetail

        static final String SP_responseDetail
        System property name for the default response detail setting for RestLogger objects.

        Can also use a JUNEAU_RESTLOGGER_RESPONSEDETAIL environment variable.

        • "STATUS_LINE" (default) - Log only the status line.
        • "HEADER" - Log the status line and headers.
        • "ENTITY" - Log the status line and headers and content if available.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SP_level

        static final String SP_level
        System property name for the logging level setting for RestLogger objects.

        Can also use a JUNEAU_RESTLOGGER_LEVEL environment variable.

        • "OFF" (default)
        • "SEVERE"
        • "WARNING"
        • "INFO"
        • "CONFIG"
        • "FINE"
        • "FINER"
        • "FINEST"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
